alert.note: Alert for Adams; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 1:50AM CST until December 14 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 245 AM CST. * At 150 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Deer Park, or 14 miles southeast of Monterey, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Sibley around 200 AM CST. Natchez and Vidalia around 220 AM CST. Cranfield around 230 AM CST. Stanton around 235 AM CST. Church Hill and Stampley around 245 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Ridgecrest. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
